item.title: Python CheatSheet
item.author: Author
item.description: Where the program starts 1 2 if __name__ == '__main__': # statements Self Use self to pass values between def’s 1 self.arr = nums Array types: List: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 letters = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g'] len(letters) # Returns length of array ## Common use list = [] list.append((a,b)) list.sort() # nlogn Tuple: is immutable! 1 dimensions = (200, 50) Dict: Basically HashMap
